text: Shannon Conley (also credited as Sonny Dey, Holly Bobbit, Ursula Conlon, Vibe Jones, Candi Washington and Deborah Zane; born December 31, 1970) is an American actress, voice actress, and vocalist based in New York City. She has done voice work in English dubs of Japanese anime for Central Park Media and NYAV Post. She is also the former lead vocalist for the all female tribute band, Lez Zeppelin. She made her Broadway debut in Hedwig and the Angry Inch as the understudy for the role of Yitzhak. == Filmography == ===Anime=== * Ah! title: Shannon Conley
